searchMenuDescription: Search for a menu by title or description to assign it to this week's plan.
noMenuForCurrentWeek: You have not assigned any menus for this week yet.
noMenuForCurrentWeekDescription: Assign an existing menu or create a new one to start planning.
selectTimezoneDescription: Choose a timezone to manage your weekly menu plan and other features that depend on time, ensuring accuracy across all schedules and reports.
updateTimezoneDescription: Updating your timezone will adjust all background operations such as reports, weekly menu plans, and other time-sensitive features to align with your selected timezone.
noTimezoneSelected: Nepasirinkta laiko juosta. Pasirinkite laiko juostą, kad galėtumėte tvarkyti savaitės meniu planą ir kitas funkcijas, kurios priklauso nuo laiko, užtikrinant tikslumą visose tvarkaraščiuose ir ataskaitose.
noWeeklyMenuFoundDescription: No weekly menus found. You probably don't have any created weekly menus yet. Go to the menu page and start creating weekly menus.
